questions.question: Which of the following statement is correct

answers.a: Energy stored in the body, when strained within the elastic limit is known as strain energy
answers.b: The maximum strain energy which can be stored in a body is termed as proof resilience
answers.c: The proof resilience/unit volume of material is known as modulus of resilience

questions.question: Instrument used to measure extension in cast iron and aluminium in this experiment is
If the material is unloaded, there will be specified percentage of strain permanently left in it. It is called

answers.a: Wrought iron is produced from cast iron
answers.b: Cast iron is produced from pig iron

questions.question: Percentage reduction of cast iron specimen during tensile test would be of order

answers.a: tensile strength< shear strength< compressive strength
answers.b: shear strength< tensile strength< compressive strength
answers.c: shear strength< compressive strength< tensile strength
answers.d: compressive strength< tensile strength< shear strength

questions.question: Wrought iron has better tensile strength than cast iron and is more ductile.
Young's modulus of Iron and Aluminium in GPa
